sentence: If the Dolphins were looking to upgrade from Michael Deiter at center, various top options stayed put between Ryan Jensen in Tampa Bay, Ben Jones with the Titans and Brian Allen with the Los Angeles Rams.
author: Tribune News Service
title: Prized free-agent tackle Terron Armstead to visit Dolphins; La’el Collins goes to Bengals

sentence: Iowa already has two early enrollees participating in spring practice: three-stars Brian Allen and Caden Crawford.
author: Kennington Lloyd Smith III
title: Is Iowa football's defensive line poised to make a big leap? Returning experience says so.
